mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jefferson High School Football Team
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ralph W. Holsinger
Rufus W. Holsinger, 1866-1930 [host]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Charlottesville. African American Jefferson "Red Devils" Starting from the front left hand: 1. Charles L. Jackson 2. Lloyd Quarterman 3. Billy "Goat" Lewis 4. John Locket 5. William "Shortie" Brown 6. Carter "Red" Wicks 7. Earl "Cap" Fortune 8. Alfred Bynum 9. Bernard Dabney Second row from left hand: 10. DuBois Johnson 11. Raleigh Kelly 12. William Cox Jackson 13. Charles "Chink" Lee 14 Grover Henderson 15. Carl Johnson 16. Phillip Sellers 17. Carol Allen Last row from left hand: 18. Nannie Henderson 19. Thomas Martin 20. Edward McCreavy 21. Beverly "Pep" Thomas Standing from left hand: 22. Dr. Edward W. Stratton, Team Physician 23. Mr. James "Wop" Edgar, Coach Special Thanks to Teresa Price for the identifications
Negative Y21177B2 depicts the same subject
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portraits, Group
Football players
Holsinger Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
African American
